H0.text: Which perennial herb is also known as milfoil. Achillea millefolium

H1.text: Which perennial herb is also known as milfoil. Tanacetum vulgare

H2.text: Which perennial herb is also known as milfoil. Matricaria chamomilla

H3.text: Which perennial herb is also known as milfoil. Yerw

A4.text: The names milfoil and thousand leaf come refer to the minutely divided leaves.
